name: Shane's Shiny Chain
description:
Shane's Shiny Chain is a puzzle game where the player's goal is to dive deeper into the temple they're in. With obstacles in the way such as pits and debris, Shane can utilise his magical chain to traverse the temple however he seems fit.

This game was developed in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, where this year's theme was Joined Together.

Word of caution! The game utilises poor physics implementation and thusly can act a little bit weird sometimes! Apologies!
